title: conferred on me by section 7 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Civil Law (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Civil Law (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) Act 2021 (Section 7) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 22nd of October
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited civil law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2021 (section 7) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 22nd october

title: conferred on me by section 7 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
conferred on me by section 7 of the Civil Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 2. The sale or supply of intoxicating liquor in an outdoor seating area
text_raw:
2. The sale or supply of intoxicating liquor in an outdoor seating area 
within the meaning of paragraph (b) of the definition of “outdoor seating area” 
is not permitted any day after 11 p.m. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 October, 2021. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th October, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [539] 3
